Caption: Prof. K.T. Chandy (Director, Board of Governors) addresses the audience at the Special Convocation. On the dais, from the left; Mr. C.V. Sethunathan, Prof. S. Sampath, Dr.Erhard Eppler, Mr. C. Subramaniam (Union Minister), Prof. K.A.V. Pandalai (Director), Prof. Ramachandran
Event: Special Convocation, Inauguration of Computer Centre
